title: Sam's Pack (4R317)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Possession
Game Text:	Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. At the start of each turn, you may add (2) to heal a Ring-bound companion.
Lore:	“He still hopefully carried some of his gear in his pack….”
Rarity:	R
